pageContext.claim: “You know, people don’t realize half the pictures were taken of separation were taken where, most of the pictures, that pictures in ’14 of kids separated from their parents. That was all Obama. People don’t say it but Obama had the same law that I did and they separated parents from children. I think you guys understand that.”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, families are being separated because of a "zero tolerance" policy from the Trump administration dating to April 2018. No law, whether passed by Democrats or otherwise, requires these separations. During the Obama administration, there may have been some separation if there was suspicion that the children were being trafficked or a claimed parent-child relationship did not actually exist. But nothing like the levels we are seeing today. One of the early photos to emerge that was tweeted by some Democrats was taken under the Obama administration, but the vast majority of photos used by the news media were contemporary.
